revised_title: The Fossil Cone Leptostrobus and its Connection to Czekanowskia
tldr: The author examines the fructification of Czekanowskia and its allied genera, focusing on the fossil cone called Leptostrobus. They reinterpret previously described specimens and provide evidence that Leptostrobus is a reproductive organ of Czekanowskia. This challenges the classification of Czekanowskia in the Ginkgoales family, as Leptostrobus has a different fructification structure than Ginkgo.
